abstract_summ: The 2019 coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic caused by the virus severe acute respiratory syndrome coronav virus-2 (SARS-CoV-2) has created an unprecedented global crisis for the infrastructure sectors, including economic, political, healthcare, education, and research systems . Currently, there are no specific antiviral drugs for the treatment of the disease . This article reviews the epidemiology, pathogenesis, clinical manifestations, diagnosis and diagnosis, and treatment methods of severe COV-19 .
